meta.name: Tom Andrieu
meta.title: Product Engineer
meta.description: Product engineer who builds meaningful products, iterates with purpose, and helps teams do their best work.

about.intro: I build <highlight>MEANINGFUL</highlight> products and help small teams do their <highlight>BEST WORK</highlight>.
about.detail: I care about craft and iteration. I'd rather enable others than micromanage them. Working with AI has made me even more optimistic about what focused teams can create.
